channel.title: Computer Science 1, Spring 2025
channel.description: Computer Science 1, Spring 2025 at Purchase College.

item.title: Week 1 - Introduction
item.description:
Introduction
- Who am I? - How did you end up here? - why did you sign up for this class? - What is computer science? - Our course goals - What are you worried about in this course? - What are you excited for or optimistic about? - What questions do you have? (for this course, for me…)?

item.title: Week 2 - Variables and Conditionals
item.description:
Note: We will take breaks at least once an hour
Today’s Schedule
- Ungraded quiz - warmup: flag - createShape() - Variables - Random - Review HW

item.title: Week 3 - Loops and Loops and Loops and Loops
item.description:
Today’s Schedule
- Review of variables and conditionals - Boolean Variables - Variables Scope - Loops - Build Pong - Play Pong - Review HW - Check-ins and Coding

item.title: Week 4 - Functions
item.description:
Today
- Pong Redux - What is a function? - System-defined functions - User-defined functions - Arguments and Parameters - Return - hw: make an office hour appointment

item.title: Week 5 - Timers and Arrays
item.description:
Today’s Schedule
- Check-in/Review - functions - Midterm info - Review simple AI homework - Timers with millis() - Arrays
Midterm Exam

item.title: Midterm Practice Questions
item.description:
Short Questions
What are the purpose of code comments?
What are variable types?
What is an algorithm?
What is an iteration?

item.title: Week 6 - Classes and Objects
item.description:
Today:
- midterm review - classes and objects - Constructor - member variables (attributes) - methods - Dot operator, this, new - build Frogger - finite state machine

item.title: Week 7 - Arrays of Objects and Debugging
item.description:
Today
- check-in - midterm review - arrays of objects - finite state machine
Midterm Exam
Arrays of objects

item.title: Week 9 - Media Files such as Images and Video
item.description:
Today’s Schedule
- midterm - media - class coding time and 1-on-1 check-ins
Midterm Exam
Working with Media

item.title: Week 10 - History of Computing and the Layers of Abstraction
item.description:
Today:
- review midterm exam - review midterm projects - history of computation - “abstraction” in computing - binary
via GIPHY History of computation

item.title: Week 11 - Libraries, Camera, Pixels
item.description:
Today:
- libraries - working with the camera - working with video - workshop: creating a camera application/frame
Libraries
What is a Library?

item.title: Week 12 - Sound, Text and Typography
item.description:
Today:
- camera software - Sound library - Strings and Fonts - Intro final project
Review camera software
Sound
